alert.note: Alert for Adair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Adair and northwestern Macon Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Plata, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Plata, Elmer and South Gifford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
